DOC.brief_summary: This study test effectiveness clinician-focused health IT-based decision support , family-focused health IT-based decision support , combination effort , increase HPV adolescent vaccine rate among adolescent girl . We hypothesize combination clinician-focused clinical decision support family-focused decision support effective .
DOC.detailed_description: - Clinician-focused intervention include electronic health record-based decision support mechanism include reminder , education , audit feedback vaccination success . - Family-focused intervention include vaccine reminder informational telephone call prompt electronic health record .
DOC.criteria: All clinician practice participate site Parents eligible adolescent girl Adolescent girl Ages 1117 Has visit one primary care center within last 15 month . Has complete teen vaccine series
